mutants.code:
def count_trees_in_forest(n: int, p: list) -> int:
    """
    Counts the number of trees in the forest based on the given sequence of most distant relatives.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The number of Balls living in the forest.
    p (list): A sequence of length n, where p[i] denotes the most distant relative from Ball i living on the same tree.

    Returns:
    int: The number of trees in the forest.
    """
    was = set()
    for i in range(2, n + 1):
        if p[p[i - 1] - 1] == i:
            was.add(min(i, p[i - 1]))
    return len(was)
